projects.heading: Rescue Maze Jr. RoboCup
projects.description: Developed an autonomous rescue robot for a simulation of a disaster zone, able to deliver rescue kits to victims.

projects.heading: Natural Selection Sim
projects.description: A graphical simulation of how Natural Selection changes the features of species throughout generations to survive.

projects.heading: Red Ball Tracker
projects.description: A simple red object tracker made in Python and OpenCV to experiment with this powerful computer vision library.

projects.heading: RoboCup @Home
projects.description: Contributed in the development of an assistance robot that can carry out household activities for the user.

projects.heading: RoBorregos Webpage
projects.description: Contributed in the development of RoBorrego's official webpage using React, Jest, and Github Actions for CI.

projects.heading: Portfolio Webpage
projects.description: Simple Portfolio website to showcase my projects and serve as a Resume using TS, React and Github pages as host.

projects.heading: ML plays Flappy Bird
projects.description: Made a flappy bird game using python, to later train a machine learning model to play the game using NEAT.

projects.heading: Piano Tile Machine
projects.description: Made a python script to play Piano Tile autonomously. It takes screenshots and moves the mouse to the best tile.

projects.heading: Stack Tower Machine
projects.description: Made a python script to play Stack the Tower autonomously. It tracks the moving block to determine when to click.

projects.heading: Labyrinth Solver
projects.description: Made a python script to fetch a random Maze and then solve it using BFS.

projects.heading: Labyrinth Solver
projects.description: Made a minesweeper game in Unity. Then made a python script to solve it.
